full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES PA 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS @004B KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHA CIG GIS 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZER BA DE LA CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MING ZHES MING BTAGS NAS TSIG MI MTHUN PA CCIG BYAS PA MANG PO YOD PA DANG, CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYING MA RNYED PA DANG, SNGA MO NAS DON NYER CAN 'GA' BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMAN PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG GI RIM 'GROR DGOS PA CHE ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR MCHOG PAR, RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA AI SRID SNYAM PA SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I, SNYING KHAMS CAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS GONGS PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS PAR 'GYUR CIG , SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
